name: InsertionPoint
shortdesc: A location between characters, used to insert new text objects.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: story
property.shortdesc: The story of the text range.

property.name: characters
property.shortdesc: All the characters in this text range.

property.name: words
property.shortdesc: All the words in this text range.

property.name: lines
property.shortdesc: All the lines in this text range.

property.name: paragraphs
property.shortdesc: All the paragraphs in this text range.

property.name: textRanges
property.shortdesc: All the text in this text range.
